attributes.action: Block the planned sale of Channel 4 so it remains a valuable asset of the state.
attributes.additional_details: Channel4 is a valuable resource. It runs at a profit (costing the taxpayer nothing) and reinvest in British companies, creating jobs &enriching the cultural life of the nation.
attributes.background: Leave Channel4 alone. Its not broke, it needs no fixing.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/613995
